channel.title: How to add more CPU power?
channel.description:
How to allocate more CPU power?
Under settings I allocate more CPUs but nothing happens. Workstation maxes out one CPU of host machine. Whonix 13 kvm worked fine.

item.title: How to add more CPU power?
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.source: How to add more CPU power?

item.title: How to add more CPU power?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Shutdown guest.

sudo virsh edit Whonix-Workstation

Scroll to the line with the vcpu tag.

remove the setting “cpuset=X”

Ctrl-X -> y -> Ctrl-M

Bump up your cpu no. in virt-manager GUI settings. Save then start.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add more CPU power?
